name: Lab 1: Recap on OOP
description:
The objectives of this lab is to:
Recap on what you have learnt in CS3231 OOP1 on Classes and Objects, and JavaFX
Get you started on how to create JavaFX UI using CODE (we focused on SceneBuilder in OOP1)
Get you to explore Java Ensemble, and to discover the rich capabilities in JavaFX
Get you started in brainstorming for your Project Idea in CS3233 OOP2
Note that you are REQUIRED to complete this lab before the start of semester 2.
If you did not complete this lab, or find the lab too challenging for you, you will be asked to reconsider if you should continue taking CS3233 OOP2.
markdown:
The objectives of this lab is to:
 • Recap on what you have learnt in CS3231 OOP1 on Classes and Objects, and JavaFX
 • Get you started on how to create JavaFX UI using CODE (we focused on SceneBuilder in OOP1)
 • Get you to explore Java Ensemble, and to discover the rich capabilities in JavaFX
 • Get you started in brainstorming for your Project Idea in CS3233 OOP2
Note that you are REQUIRED to complete this lab before the start of semester 2.
If you did not complete this lab, or find the lab too challenging for you, you will be asked to reconsider if you should continue taking CS3233 OOP2.
